00011 // dots.cpp*
00012 #include "pbrt.h"
00013 #include "texture.h"
00014 #include "paramset.h"
00015 // DotsTexture Declarations
00016 template <class T> class DotsTexture : public Texture<T> {
00017 public:
00018         // DotsTexture Public Methods
00019         ~DotsTexture() {
00020                 delete mapping;
00021         }
00022         DotsTexture(TextureMapping2D *m, Reference<Texture<T> > c1,
00023                         Reference<Texture<T> > c2) {
00024                 mapping = m;
00025                 outsideDot = c1;
00026                 insideDot = c2;
00027         }
00028         T Evaluate(const DifferentialGeometry &dg) const {
00029                 // Compute cell indices for dots
00030                 float s, t, dsdx, dtdx, dsdy, dtdy;
00031                 mapping->Map(dg, &s, &t, &dsdx, &dtdx, &dsdy, &dtdy);
00032                 int sCell = Floor2Int(s + .5f), tCell = Floor2Int(t + .5f);
00033                 // Return _insideDot_ result if point is inside dot
00034                 if (Noise(sCell+.5f, tCell+.5f) > 0) {
00035                         float radius = .35f;
00036                         float maxShift = 0.5f - radius;
00037                         float sCenter = sCell + maxShift *
00038                                 Noise(sCell + 1.5f, tCell + 2.8f);
00039                         float tCenter = tCell + maxShift *
00040                                 Noise(sCell + 4.5f, tCell + 9.8f);
00041                         float ds = s - sCenter, dt = t - tCenter;
00042                         if (ds*ds + dt*dt < radius*radius)
00043                                 return insideDot->Evaluate(dg);
00044                 }
00045                 return outsideDot->Evaluate(dg);
00046         }
00047 private:
00048         // DotsTexture Private Data
00049         Reference<Texture<T> > outsideDot, insideDot;
00050         TextureMapping2D *mapping;
00051 };
00052 // DotsTexture Method Definitions
00053 extern "C" DLLEXPORT Texture<float> * CreateFloatTexture(const Transform &tex2world,
00054                 const TextureParams &tp) {
00055         // Initialize 2D texture mapping _map_ from _tp_
00056         TextureMapping2D *map = NULL;
00057         string type = tp.FindString("mapping");
00058         if (type == "" || type == "uv") {
00059                 float su = tp.FindFloat("uscale", 1.);
00060                 float sv = tp.FindFloat("vscale", 1.);
00061                 float du = tp.FindFloat("udelta", 0.);
00062                 float dv = tp.FindFloat("vdelta", 0.);
00063                 map = new UVMapping2D(su, sv, du, dv);
00064         }
00065         else if (type == "spherical") map = new SphericalMapping2D(tex2world.GetInverse());
00066         else if (type == "cylindrical") map = new CylindricalMapping2D(tex2world.GetInverse());
00067         else if (type == "planar")
00068                 map = new PlanarMapping2D(tp.FindVector("v1", Vector(1,0,0)),
00069                         tp.FindVector("v2", Vector(0,1,0)),
00070                         tp.FindFloat("udelta", 0.f), tp.FindFloat("vdelta", 0.f));
00071         else {
00072                 Error("2D texture mapping \"%s\" unknown", type.c_str());
00073                 map = new UVMapping2D;
00074         }
00075         return new DotsTexture<float>(map,
00076                 tp.GetFloatTexture("inside", 1.f),
00077                 tp.GetFloatTexture("outside", 0.f));
00078 }
00079 
00080 extern "C" DLLEXPORT Texture<Spectrum> * CreateSpectrumTexture(const Transform &tex2world,
00081                 const TextureParams &tp) {
00082         // Initialize 2D texture mapping _map_ from _tp_
00083         TextureMapping2D *map = NULL;
00084         string type = tp.FindString("mapping");
00085         if (type == "" || type == "uv") {
00086                 float su = tp.FindFloat("uscale", 1.);
00087                 float sv = tp.FindFloat("vscale", 1.);
00088                 float du = tp.FindFloat("udelta", 0.);
00089                 float dv = tp.FindFloat("vdelta", 0.);
00090                 map = new UVMapping2D(su, sv, du, dv);
00091         }
00092         else if (type == "spherical") map = new SphericalMapping2D(tex2world.GetInverse());
00093         else if (type == "cylindrical") map = new CylindricalMapping2D(tex2world.GetInverse());
00094         else if (type == "planar")
00095                 map = new PlanarMapping2D(tp.FindVector("v1", Vector(1,0,0)),
00096                         tp.FindVector("v2", Vector(0,1,0)),
00097                         tp.FindFloat("udelta", 0.f), tp.FindFloat("vdelta", 0.f));
00098         else {
00099                 Error("2D texture mapping \"%s\" unknown", type.c_str());
00100                 map = new UVMapping2D;
00101         }
00102         return new DotsTexture<Spectrum>(map,
00103                 tp.GetSpectrumTexture("inside", 1.f),
00104                 tp.GetSpectrumTexture("outside", 0.f));
00105 }
